nacl/nacl_srpc.h File Reference

Defines the API in the Simple RPC (SRPC) library. More...

Data Structures

  • struct NaClSrpcVariantArray
    Argument data type for passing arrays of NaClSrpcArg. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcCharArray
    Argument data type for passing arrays of char. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcIntArray
    Argument data type for passing arrays of int. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcDoubleArray
    Argument data type for passing arrays of double. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcArg
    Used to convey parameters to and from RPC invocations. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcRpc
    Remote procedure call state structure. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcHandlerDesc
    Binaries that implement SRPC methods (servers) describe their services using these structures. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcImcBuffer
    The structure used to provide a buffering layer over the IMC. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcService
    A description of the services available on a channel. More...
  • struct NaClSrpcChannel
    The encapsulation of all the data necessary for an RPC connection, either client or server. More...

Detailed Description

Defines the API in the Simple RPC (SRPC) library.
